[Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull , [I]0-i have a suspicion that [you]134-dr. bull will see better through these than through [your]134-dr. bull own highly decorative spectacles . ” [He]0-i handed the field‑glasses to [the Doctor]2681-the doctor , who immediately took off [his]2681-the doctor spectacles and put the apparatus to [his]2681-the doctor eyes . “[134-dr. bull] It can not be as bad as [you]134-dr. bull say , ” said [the Professor]805-the professor , somewhat shaken . “[134-dr. bull] There are a good number of [them]1250-them certainly , but [they]1250-them may easily be [ordinary tourists]1251-ordinary tourists . ” “[1251-ordinary tourists] Do [ordinary tourists]1251-ordinary tourists , ” asked [Bull]134-dr. bull , with the fieldglasses to [his]134-dr. bull eyes , “[1251-ordinary tourists] wear black masks half‑way down the face ? ” [Syme]85-syme almost tore the glasses out of [his]85-syme hand , and looked through them . [Most men in the advancing mob]2932-most men in the advancing mob really looked ordinary enough ; but it was quite true that [two or three of [the leaders in front]2934-the leaders in front]2933-two or three of the leaders in front wore black half‑masks almost down to [their]2933-two or three of the leaders in front mouths . This disguise is very complete , especially at such a distance , and [Syme]85-syme found it impossible to conclude anything from the clean - shaven jaws and chins of [the men talking in the front]2935-the men talking in the front . But presently as [they]1250-them talked [they]1250-them all smiled and one of [them]1250-them smiled on one side . [SYME]85-syme put the field‑glasses from [his]85-syme eyes with an almost ghastly relief . “[1251-ordinary tourists] [The President]2320-the president is not with [them]1250-them , anyhow , ” [he]85-syme said , and wiped [his]85-syme forehead . “[2320-the president] But surely [they]1250-them are right away on the horizon , ” said [the bewildered Colonel]2936-the bewildered colonel , blinking and but half recovered from [Bull]134-dr. bull ’s hasty though polite explanation . “[1250-them] Could [you]1254-you possibly know [[your]1254-you President]341-your president among [all those people]1256-all those people ? ” “[1254-you] Could [I]0-i know a white elephant among [all those people]1256-all those people ! ” answered [Syme]85-syme somewhat irritably . “[1254-you] As [you]1254-you very truly say , [they]1250-them are on the horizon ; but if [he]2320-the president were walking with [them]1250-them . . . by [God]95-god ! [I]0-i believe [this ground]1258-this ground would shake . ” After an instant ’s pause [the new man]2937-the new man called [Ratcliffe]163-ratcliffe said with gloomy decision — “[0-i] Of course [the President]2320-the president is n’t with [them]1250-them . [I]0-i wish to Gemini [he]2320-the president were . Much more likely [the President]2320-the president is riding in triumph through [Paris]34-paris , or sitting on [the ruins of [St. Paul ’s Cathedral]41-st. paul ’s cathedral]1261-the ruins of st. paul ’s cathedral . ” “[2320-the president] This is absurd ! ” said [Syme]85-syme . “[2320-the president] Something may have happened in [our]1262-our absence ; but [he]2320-the president can not have carried [the world]231-the world with a rush like that . It is quite true , ” [he]85-syme added , frowning dubiously at [the distant fields that lay towards [the little station]2939-the little station]2938-the distant fields that lay towards the little station , “[1264-a crowd] it is certainly true that there seems to be [a crowd]1264-a crowd coming this way ; but [they]1264-a crowd are not [all the army that [you]1266-you make out]1265-all the army that you make out . ” “[1264-a crowd] Oh , [they]1264-a crowd , ” said [the new detective]2940-the new detective contemptuously ; “[1264-a crowd] no [they]1264-a crowd are not a very valuable force . But let [me]0-i tell [you]1266-you frankly that they are precisely calculated to [our]1262-our value — [we]1262-our are not much , [[my]0-i boy]2349-my boy , in [[Sunday]107-sunday ’s universe]1268-sunday ’s universe . [He]2320-the president has got hold of all the cables and telegraphs [himself]2320-the president . But to kill [the Supreme Council]433-the supreme council [he]2320-the president regards as a trivial matter , like a post card ; it may be left to [[his]2320-the president private secretary]1270-his private secretary , ” and [he]2320-the president spat on the grass . Then [he]2320-the president turned to [the others]604-the others and said somewhat austerely — “[1270-his private secretary] There is a great deal to be said for death ; but if [anyone]363-anyone has any preference for the other alternative , [I]0-i strongly advise [him]363-anyone to walk after [me]0-i . ” With these words , [he]2320-the president turned [his]2320-the president broad back and strode with silent energy towards [the wood]2942-the wood . [The others]604-the others gave one glance over [their]604-the others shoulders , and saw that the dark cloud of [men]214-men had detached itself from [the station]1177-the station and was moving with a mysterious discipline across [the plain]2946-the plain . [They]604-the others saw already , even with the naked eye , black blots on the foremost faces , which marked the masks [they]604-the others wore . [They]604-the others turned and followed [[their]604-the others leader , who had already struck the wood , and disappeared among the twinkling trees]2947-their leader , who had already struck the wood , and disappeared among the twinkling trees . The sun on the grass was dry and hot . So in plunging into [the wood]2942-the wood [they]604-the others had a cool shock of shadow , as of [divers who plunge into a dim pool]2949-divers who plunge into a dim pool . The inside of [the wood]2942-the wood was full of shattered sunlight and shaken shadows . [They]604-the others made a sort of shuddering veil , almost recalling the dizziness of a cinematograph . Even the solid figures walking with [him]2320-the president [Syme]85-syme could hardly see for the patterns of sun and shade that danced upon [them]604-the others . Now [a man]221-a man ’s head was lit as with a light of Rembrandt , leaving all else obliterated ; now again [he]221-a man had strong and staring white hands with the face of [a negro]2952-a negro . [The ex‑Marquis]2953-the ex‑marquis had pulled the old straw hat over [his]221-a man eyes , and the black shade of the brim cut [his]221-a man face so squarely in two that it seemed to be wearing one of the black half - masks of [[their]604-the others pursuers]2954-their pursuers . The fancy tinted [Syme]85-syme ’s overwhelming sense of wonder . Was [he]221-a man wearing a mask ? Was [anyone wearing a mask]2955-anyone wearing a mask ? Was [anyone]363-anyone anything ? [This wood of witchery]2957-this wood of witchery , in which [men]214-men ’s faces turned black and white by turns , in which [their]214-men figures first swelled into sunlight and then faded into formless night , this mere chaos of chiaroscuro ( after the clear daylight outside ) , seemed to [Syme]85-syme a perfect symbol of the world in which [he]85-syme had been moving for three days , [this world where [men]214-men]2959-this world where men took off [their]214-men beards and [their]214-men spectacles and [their]214-men noses , and turned into [other people]2256-other people . That tragic self‑confidence which [he]85-syme had felt when [he]85-syme believed that [the Marquis]745-the marquis was [a devil]463-a devil had strangely disappeared now that [he]85-syme knew that [the Marquis]745-the marquis was [a friend]368-a friend . [He]85-syme felt almost inclined to ask after all these bewilderments what was [a friend]368-a friend and what [an enemy]2967-an enemy . Was there anything that was apart from what it seemed ? [The Marquis]129-marquis de st. eustache had taken off [his]129-marquis de st. eustache nose and turned out to be [a detective]2166-a detective . Might [he]129-marquis de st. eustache not just as well take off [his]129-marquis de st. eustache head and turn out to be [a hobgoblin]2969-a hobgoblin ? Was not everything , after all , like [this bewildering woodland]2970-this bewildering woodland , this dance of dark and light ? Everything only a glimpse , the glimpse always unforeseen , and always forgotten . For [Gabriel Syme]85-syme had found in the heart of that sun - splashed wood what [many modern painters]2971-many modern painters had found there . [He]85-syme had found the thing which [the modern people]2972-the modern people call Impressionism , which is another name for that final scepticism which can find no floor to [the universe]2261-the universe . As [a man in an evil dream]2974-a man in an evil dream strains [himself]2974-a man in an evil dream to scream and wake , [Syme]85-syme strove with a sudden effort to fling off this last and worst of [his]85-syme fancies . With two impatient strides [he]85-syme overtook [the man in the Marquis]2975-the man in the marquis ’s straw hat , [the man whom [he]85-syme had come to address as [Ratcliffe]163-ratcliffe]2976-the man whom he had come to address as ratcliffe . In a voice exaggeratively loud and cheerful , [he]85-syme broke the bottomless silence and made conversation . “[0-i] May [I]0-i ask , ” [he]85-syme said , “[0-i] where on earth [we]1272-we are all going to ? ” So genuine had been the doubts of [his]85-syme soul , that [he]85-syme was quite glad to hear [[his]85-syme companion]291-his companion speak in an easy , human voice . “[1272-we] [We]1272-we must get down through [the town of Lancy]1273-the town of lancy to [the sea]2145-the sea , ” [he]85-syme said . “[0-i] [I]0-i think [that part of [the country]1276-the country]1275-that part of the country is least likely to be with [them]1277-them . ” “[0-i] What can [you]0-i mean by all this ? ” cried [Syme]85-syme . “[0-i] [They]1277-them ca n’t be running [the real world]1278-the real world in that way . Surely [not many working men]1279-not many working men are [anarchists]2124-anarchists , and surely if [they]1279-not many working men were , [mere mobs]1281-mere mobs could not beat [modern armies]1282-modern armies and [police]1283-police . ” “[1281-mere mobs] [Mere mobs]1281-mere mobs ! ” repeated [[his]85-syme new friend]2978-his new friend with a snort of scorn . “[1281-mere mobs] So [you]0-i talk about [mobs]1285-mobs and [the working classes]1286-the working classes as if [they]1287-they were the question . [You]0-i ’ve got that eternal idiotic idea that if anarchy came it would come from [the poor]476-the poor . Why should it ? [The poor]476-the poor have been [rebels]1290-rebels , but [they]476-the poor have never been [anarchists]2124-anarchists ; [they]476-the poor have more interest than anyone else in there being some decent government . [The poor man]1292-the poor man really has a stake in [the country]1276-the country . [The rich man]1294-the rich man has n’t ; [he]1294-the rich man can go away to [New Guinea]61-new guinea in [a yacht]1295-a yacht . [The poor]476-the poor have sometimes objected to being governed badly ; [the rich]1297-the rich have always objected to being governed at all . [Aristocrats]1298-aristocrats were always [anarchists]2124-anarchists , as [you]0-i can see from [the barons]1300-the barons ’ wars . ” “[2124-anarchists] As a lecture on English history for [the little ones]1301-the little ones , ” said [Syme]85-syme , “[2124-anarchists] this is all very nice ; but [I]0-i have not yet grasped its application . ” “[0-i] Its application is , ” said [[his]0-i informant]2979-his informant , “[0-i] that [most of [old Sunday ’s right‑hand men]1303-old sunday ’s right‑hand men]1302-most of old sunday ’s right‑hand men are [South African and American millionaires]1304-south african and american millionaires . That is why [he]1305-he has got hold of all the communications ; and that is why [the last four champions of [the anti‑anarchist police force]1307-the anti‑anarchist police force]1306-the last four champions of the anti‑anarchist police force are running through [a wood]1308-a wood like rabbits . ” “[1309-millionaires] [Millionaires]1309-millionaires [I]0-i can understand , ” said [Syme]85-syme thoughtfully , “[1309-millionaires] [they]1309-millionaires are nearly all mad . But getting hold of [a few wicked old gentlemen with hobbies]1310-a few wicked old gentlemen with hobbies is one thing ; getting hold of [great Christian nations]1311-great christian nations is another . [I]0-i would bet the nose off [my]0-i face ( forgive the allusion ) that [Sunday]107-sunday would stand perfectly helpless before the task of converting [any ordinary healthy person]1312-any ordinary healthy person anywhere . ” “[107-sunday] Well , ” said [the other]279-the other , “[107-sunday] it rather depends what sort of person [you]0-i mean . ” “[0-i] Well , for instance , ” said [Syme]85-syme , “[1305-he] [he]1305-he could never convert [that person]1313-that person , ” and [he]85-syme pointed straight in front of [him]279-the other . [They]1309-millionaires had come to an open space of sunlight , which seemed to express to [Syme]85-syme the final return of [his]85-syme own good sense ; and in the middle of [this forest clearing]2981-this forest clearing was [a figure that might well stand for that common sense in an almost awful actuality . [[His]2983-a heavy french peasant cart]2984-his cart stood a few yards off , already half full of timber ; and the horse that cropped the grass was , like [[his]2983-a heavy french peasant master]2985-his master , valorous but not desperate ; like [[his]2983-a heavy french peasant master]2985-his master , [he]2983-a heavy french peasant was even prosperous , but yet was almost sad . [The man]294-the man was [a Norman]2988-a norman , taller than the average of [the French]164-the french and very angular ; and [his]294-the man swarthy figure stood dark against a square of sunlight , almost like [some allegoric figure of labour frescoed on a ground of gold]2989-some allegoric figure of labour frescoed on a ground of gold . “[85-syme] [Mr. Syme]85-syme is saying , ” called out [Ratcliffe]163-ratcliffe to [the French Colonel]2990-the french colonel , “[85-syme] that [this man]360-this man , at least , will never be [an anarchist]1937-an anarchist . ” “[85-syme] [Mr. Syme]85-syme is right enough there , ” answered [Colonel Ducroix]158-colonel ducroix , laughing , “[85-syme] if only for the reason that [he]85-syme has plenty of property to defend . But [I]0-i forgot that in [[your]85-syme country]1316-your country [you]85-syme are not used to [peasants]1317-peasants being wealthy . ” “[85-syme] [He]85-syme looks poor , ” said [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull doubtfully . “[85-syme] Quite so , ” said [the Colonel]2828-the colonel ; “[85-syme] that is why [he]85-syme is rich . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i have an idea , ” called out [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull suddenly ; “[0-i] how much would [he]85-syme take to give [us]1318-they a lift in [[his]85-syme cart]2984-his cart ? [He]85-syme is not being tipped . ” And even while [they]1318-they seemed to hear the heavy feet of [[their]1318-they strange pursuers]2994-their strange pursuers behind [them]1318-they , [they]1318-they had to stand and stamp while [the French Colonel]2990-the french colonel talked to [the French wood‑cutter]2996-the french wood‑cutter with all the leisurely badinage and bickering of market‑day . [The whole company]614-the whole company , therefore , piled [themselves]1318-they on top of the stacks of wood , and went rocking in [the rude cart]3006-the rude cart down [the other and steeper side of [the woodland]3008-the woodland]3007-the other and steeper side of the woodland . Heavy and ramshackle as was [the vehicle]3009-the vehicle , it was driven quickly enough , and [they]1318-they soon had the exhilarating impression of distancing altogether those , whoever [they]1318-they were , who were hunting [them]1318-they . For , after all , the riddle as to where [the anarchists]337-the anarchists had got [all these followers]3011-all these followers was still unsolved . [One man]616-one man ’s presence had sufficed for [them]1318-they ; [they]1318-they had fled at the first sight of the deformed smile of [the Secretary]701-the secretary . [Syme]85-syme every now and then looked back over [his]85-syme shoulder at [the army on [their]1318-they track]3014-the army on their track . As the wood grew first thinner and then smaller with distance , [he]85-syme could see [the sunlit slopes beyond]3015-the sunlit slopes beyond [it]3016-it and above [it]3016-it ; and across these was still moving the square black mob like one monstrous beetle . In the very strong sunlight and with [his]85-syme own very strong eyes , which were almost telescopic , [Syme]85-syme could see this mass of [men]214-men quite plainly . [He]85-syme could see [them]1318-they as [separate human figures]3018-separate human figures ; but [he]85-syme was increasingly surprised by the way in which [they]1318-they moved as [one man]616-one man . [They]1318-they seemed to be dressed in dark clothes and plain hats , like [any common crowd out of [the streets]402-the streets]3020-any common crowd out of the streets ; but [they]1318-they did not spread and sprawl and trail by various lines to the attack , as would be natural in [an ordinary mob]3022-an ordinary mob . [They]1318-they moved with a sort of dreadful and wicked woodenness , like [a staring army of automatons]3023-a staring army of automatons . [Syme]85-syme pointed this out to [Ratcliffe]163-ratcliffe . “[85-syme] Yes , ” replied [the policeman]2202-the policeman , “[85-syme] that ’s discipline . That ’s [Sunday]107-sunday . [He]1322-he is perhaps five hundred miles off , but the fear of [him]1322-he is on all of [them]1323-them , like the finger of [God]95-god . Yes , [they]1323-them are walking regularly ; and [you]1324-you bet [your]1324-you boots that [they]1323-them are talking regularly , yes , and thinking regularly . But the one important thing for [us]1325-us is that they are disappearing regularly . ” [Syme]85-syme nodded . It was true that the black patch of [the pursuing men]3025-the pursuing men was growing smaller and smaller as [the peasant]3026-the peasant belaboured [his]3026-the peasant horse . The level of [the sunlit landscape]3027-the sunlit landscape , though flat as a whole , fell away on [the farther side of [the wood]2942-the wood]3028-the farther side of the wood in billows of heavy slope towards [the sea]2145-the sea , in a way not unlike [the lower slopes of [the Sussex downs]3032-the sussex downs]3031-the lower slopes of the sussex downs . The only difference was that in [Sussex]63-sussex [the road]278-the road would have been broken and angular like [a little brook]3034-a little brook , but here [the white French road]3035-the white french road fell sheer in front of [them]1323-them like a waterfall . Down this direct descent [the cart]3036-the cart clattered at a considerable angle , and in a few minutes , [the road]278-the road growing yet steeper , [they]1323-them saw below [them]1323-them [the little harbour of [Lancy]62-lancy]3038-the little harbour of lancy and [a great blue arc of [the sea]2145-the sea]3039-a great blue arc of the sea . The travelling cloud of [[their]1323-them enemies]3041-their enemies had wholly disappeared from the horizon . [The horse and cart]3042-the horse and cart took a sharp turn round a clump of elms , and the horse ’s nose nearly struck the face of [an old gentleman who was sitting on the benches outside [the little café of “[0-i] [Le Soleil d’Or]1326-le soleil d’or]3044-the little café of “ le soleil d’or . ” [The peasant]3026-the peasant]3043-an old gentleman who was sitting on the benches outside the little café of “ le soleil d’or . ” the peasant grunted an apology , and got down from [his]3026-the peasant seat . [The others]604-the others also descended one by one , and spoke to [the old gentleman]2515-the old gentleman with fragmentary phrases of courtesy , for it was quite evident from [his]2515-the old gentleman expansive manner that [he]2515-the old gentleman was [the owner of [the little tavern]520-the little tavern]3048-the owner of the little tavern . [He]2515-the old gentleman was [a white‑haired , apple‑faced old boy , with sleepy eyes and a grey moustache]3050-a white‑haired , apple‑faced old boy , with sleepy eyes and a grey moustache ; stout , sedentary , and very innocent , of a type that may often be found in [France]55-france , but is still commoner in [Catholic Germany]64-catholic germany . Everything about [him]2515-the old gentleman , [his]2515-the old gentleman pipe , [his]2515-the old gentleman pot of beer , [his]2515-the old gentleman flowers , and [his]2515-the old gentleman beehive , suggested an ancestral peace ; only when [[his]2515-the old gentleman visitors]3051-his visitors looked up as [they]3051-his visitors entered [the inn-­parlour]3052-the inn-­parlour , [they]3051-his visitors saw the sword upon the wall . [The Colonel]2828-the colonel , who greeted [the innkeeper]3003-the innkeeper as [an old friend]3055-an old friend , passed rapidly into [the inn‑parlour]3056-the inn‑parlour , and sat down ordering some ritual refreshment . The military decision of [his]2515-the old gentleman action interested [Syme]85-syme , who sat next to [him]2515-the old gentleman , and [he]85-syme took the opportunity when [the old innkeeper]3057-the old innkeeper had gone out of satisfying [his]3057-the old innkeeper curiosity . “[0-i] May [I]0-i ask [you]0-i , [Colonel]158-colonel ducroix , ” [he]0-i said in a low voice , “[0-i] why [we]1327-we have come here ? ” [Colonel Ducroix]158-colonel ducroix smiled behind [his]158-colonel ducroix bristly white moustache . “[0-i] For two reasons , [sir]2017-sir , ” [he]0-i said ; “[0-i] and [I]0-i will give first , not the most important , but the most utilitarian . [We]1327-we came here because this is the only place within twenty miles in which [we]1327-we can get horses . ” “[1327-we] Horses ! ” repeated [Syme]85-syme , looking up quickly . “[1327-we] Yes , ” replied [the other]279-the other ; “[1327-we] if [[you]2017-sir people]1329-you people are really to distance [[your]2017-sir enemies]1330-your enemies it is horses or nothing for [you]2017-sir , unless of course [you]2017-sir have [bicycles and motor‑cars]1331-bicycles and motor‑cars in [your]2017-sir pocket . ” “[2017-sir] And where do [you]158-colonel ducroix advise [us]1327-we to make for ? ” asked [Syme]85-syme doubtfully . “[158-colonel ducroix] Beyond question , ” replied [the Colonel]2828-the colonel , “[158-colonel ducroix] [you]2017-sir had better make all haste to [the police station beyond [the town]1210-the town]1332-the police station beyond the town . [[My]0-i friend]1334-my friend , whom [I]0-i seconded under somewhat deceptive circumstances , seems to [me]0-i to exaggerate very much the possibilities of [a general rising]1335-a general rising ; but even [he]1334-my friend would hardly maintain , [I]0-i suppose , that [you]2017-sir were not safe with [the gendarmes]1336-the gendarmes . ” [Syme]85-syme nodded gravely ; then [he]85-syme said abruptly — “[1334-my friend] And [your]158-colonel ducroix other reason for coming [here]2025-here ? ” “[158-colonel ducroix] [My]0-i other reason for coming here , ” said [Ducroix]158-colonel ducroix soberly , “[0-i] is that it is just as well to see [a good man]1338-a good man or two when [one]225-one is possibly near to death . ” [Syme]85-syme looked up at the wall , and saw a crudely - painted and pathetic religious picture . Then [he]85-syme said — “[158-colonel ducroix] [You]158-colonel ducroix are right , ” and then almost immediately afterwards , “[158-colonel ducroix] Has [anyone]363-anyone seen about the horses ? ” “[363-anyone] Yes , ” answered [Ducroix]158-colonel ducroix , “[363-anyone] [you]2017-sir may be quite certain that [I]0-i gave orders the moment [I]0-i came in . [Those enemies of yours]1341-those enemies of yours gave no impression of hurry , but [they]1341-those enemies of yours were really moving wonderfully fast , like [a well‑trained army]1342-a well‑trained army . [I]0-i had no idea that [the anarchists]337-the anarchists had so much discipline . [You]2017-sir have not a moment to waste . ” Almost as [he]0-i spoke , [the old innkeeper with the blue eyes and white hair]3060-the old innkeeper with the blue eyes and white hair came ambling into [the room]292-the room , and announced that six horses were saddled outside . By [Ducroix]158-colonel ducroix ’s advice [the five others]3062-the five others equipped [themselves]3062-the five others with some portable form of food and wine , and keeping [their]3062-the five others duelling swords as the only weapons available , [they]3062-the five others clattered away down [the steep , white road]3063-the steep , white road . [The two servants , who had carried [the Marquis]745-the marquis ’s luggage when [he]745-the marquis was [a marquis]3066-a marquis]3064-the two servants , who had carried the marquis ’s luggage when he was a marquis , were left behind to drink at the café by common consent , and not at all against [their]3062-the five others own inclination . By this time the afternoon sun was slanting westward , and by its rays [Syme]85-syme could see the sturdy figure of [the old innkeeper]3057-the old innkeeper growing smaller and smaller , but still standing and looking after [them]3062-the five others quite silently , the sunshine in [his]3057-the old innkeeper silver hair . [Syme]85-syme had a fixed , superstitious fancy , left in [his]85-syme mind by the chance phrase of [the Colonel]2828-the colonel , that this was indeed , perhaps , [the last honest stranger whom [he]85-syme should ever see upon [the earth]234-the earth]3069-the last honest stranger whom he should ever see upon the earth . [He]85-syme was still looking at [this dwindling figure , which stood as a mere grey blot touched with a white flame]3071-this dwindling figure , which stood as a mere grey blot touched with a white flame against the great green wall of [the steep down behind [him]85-syme]3072-the steep down behind him . And as [he]85-syme stared over the top of the down behind [the innkeeper]3003-the innkeeper , there appeared [an army of black‑clad and marching men]3074-an army of black‑clad and marching men . [They]3074-an army of black‑clad and marching men seemed to hang above [the good man]3075-the good man and [[his]3075-the good man house]3076-his house like a black cloud of locusts . The horses had been saddled none too soon . URGING the horses to a gallop , without respect to the rather rugged descent of [the road]278-the road , [the horsemen]3078-the horsemen soon regained [their]3078-the horsemen advantage over [the men on the march]3079-the men on the march , and at last [the bulk of [the first buildings of [Lancy]62-lancy]3081-the first buildings of lancy]3080-the bulk of the first buildings of lancy cut off the sight of [[their]3078-the horsemen pursuers]2954-their pursuers . Nevertheless , the ride had been a long one , and by the time [they]3078-the horsemen reached [the real town]3083-the real town the west was warming with the colour and quality of sunset . [The Colonel]2828-the colonel suggested that , before making finally for [the police station]3085-the police station , [they]3078-the horsemen should make the effort , in passing , to attach to [themselves]3078-the horsemen [one more individual who might be useful]3086-one more individual who might be useful . “[2017-sir] [Four out of [the five rich men in [this town]1346-this town]1345-the five rich men in this town]1344-four out of the five rich men in this town , ” [he]0-i said , “[1349-the fifth] are [common swindlers]1347-common swindlers . [I]0-i suppose the proportion is pretty equal all over [the world]231-the world . [The fifth]1349-the fifth is [a friend of mine]1350-a friend of mine , and [a very fine fellow]1351-a very fine fellow ; and what is even more important from [our]1352-we point of view , [he]1349-the fifth owns [a motor‑car]1353-a motor‑car . ” “[1349-the fifth] [I]0-i am afraid , ” said [the Professor]805-the professor in [his]0-i mirthful way , looking back along [the white road on which the black , crawling patch might appear at any moment]3088-the white road on which the black , crawling patch might appear at any moment , “[1349-the fifth] [I]0-i am afraid [we]1352-we have hardly time for afternoon calls . ” “[150-the doctor] [[Doctor Renard]150-the doctor ’s house]1354-doctor renard ’s house is only three minutes off , ” said [the Colonel]2828-the colonel . “[150-the doctor] [Our]1352-we danger , ” said [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull , “[150-the doctor] is not two minutes off . ” “[150-the doctor] Yes , ” said [Syme]85-syme , “[150-the doctor] if [we]1352-we ride on fast [we]1352-we must leave [them]1355-they behind , for [they]1355-they are on foot . ” “[150-the doctor] [He]150-the doctor has [a motor‑car]1353-a motor‑car , ” said [the Colonel]2828-the colonel . “[150-the doctor] But [we]1352-we may not get it , ” said [Bull]134-dr. bull . “[150-the doctor] Yes , [he]150-the doctor is quite on [your]1357-your side . ” “[150-the doctor] But [he]150-the doctor might be out . ” “[150-the doctor] Hold [your]1357-your tongue , ” said [Syme]85-syme suddenly . “[1357-your] What is that noise ? ” For a second [they]1352-we all sat as still as [equestrian statues]3091-equestrian statues , and for a second — for two or three or four seconds — [heaven and earth]3092-heaven and earth seemed equally still . Then all [their]1352-we ears , in an agony of attention , heard along [the road]278-the road that indescribable thrill and throb that means only one thing — horses ! [The Colonel]2828-the colonel ’s face had an instantaneous change , as if lightning had struck it , and yet left it scatheless . “[1355-they] [They]1355-they have done [us]1352-we , ” [he]2828-the colonel said , with brief military irony . “[1355-they] Prepare to receive cavalry ! ” “[1355-they] Where can [they]1355-they have got the horses ? ” asked [Syme]85-syme , as [he]85-syme mechanically urged [his]85-syme steed to a canter . [The Colonel]2828-the colonel was silent for a little , then [he]2828-the colonel said in a strained voice — “[0-i] [I]0-i was speaking with strict accuracy when [I]0-i said that [the ‘ Soleil d’Or ’]1358-the ‘ soleil d’or ’ was the only place where [one can get horses within twenty miles]1359-one can get horses within twenty miles . ” “[0-i] No ! ” said [Syme]85-syme violently , “[1360-he] [I]0-i do n’t believe [he]1360-he ’d do it . Not with all that white hair . ” “[1360-he] [He]1360-he may have been forced , ” said [the Colonel]2828-the colonel gently . “[1360-he] [They]1355-they must be at least a hundred strong , for which reason [we]1352-we are all going to see [[my]0-i friend]1334-my friend [Renard]150-the doctor , who has [a motor‑car]1353-a motor‑car . ” With these words [he]150-the doctor swung [his]150-the doctor horse suddenly round [a street corner]3097-a street corner , and went down [the street]277-the street with such thundering speed , that [the others , though already well at the gallop]3099-the others , though already well at the gallop , had difficulty in following the flying tail of [his]150-the doctor horse . [Dr. Renard]165-dr. renard inhabited [a high and comfortable house at the top of [a steep street]3101-a steep street]3100-a high and comfortable house at the top of a steep street , so that when [the riders]3102-the riders alighted at [his]165-dr. renard door [they]3102-the riders could once more see [the solid green ridge of [the hill]3104-the hill]3103-the solid green ridge of the hill , with [the white road]3105-the white road across [it]3104-the hill , standing up above [all the roofs of [the town]1210-the town]3106-all the roofs of the town . [They]3102-the riders breathed again to see that [the road]278-the road as yet was clear , and [they]3102-the riders rang the bell . [Dr. Renard]165-dr. renard was [a beaming , brown‑bearded man]3109-a beaming , brown‑bearded man , a good example of that silent but very busy professional class which [France]55-france has preserved even more perfectly than [England]13-england . When the matter was explained to [him]165-dr. renard [he]165-dr. renard pooh - poohed the panic of the ex‑Marquis altogether ; [he]165-dr. renard said , with the solid French scepticism , that there was no conceivable probability of [a general anarchist]3110-a general anarchist rising . “[166-anarchy] [Anarchy]166-anarchy , ” [he]165-dr. renard said , shrugging [his]165-dr. renard shoulders , “[166-anarchy] it is childishness ! ” “[166-anarchy] Et ça , ” cried out [the Colonel]2828-the colonel suddenly , pointing over the other ’s shoulder , “[166-anarchy] and that is childishness , is n’t it ? ” [They]3102-the riders all looked round , and saw a curve of [black cavalry]3112-black cavalry come sweeping over [the top of [the hill]3104-the hill]3113-the top of the hill with all the energy of [Attila]167-attila . Swiftly as [they]3102-the riders rode , however , [the whole rank]3115-the whole rank still kept well together , and [they]3102-the riders could see the black vizards of the first line as level as a line of uniforms . But although the main black square was the same , though travelling faster , there was now one sensational difference which [they]3102-the riders could see clearly upon [the slope of [the hill]3104-the hill]3116-the slope of the hill , as if upon a slanted map . [The bulk of [the riders]3102-the riders]3118-the bulk of the riders were in [one block]3120-one block ; but [one rider]3121-one rider flew far ahead of the column , and with frantic movements of hand and heel urged [his]3121-one rider horse faster and faster , so that [one]225-one might have fancied that [he]3121-one rider was not [the pursuer]3123-the pursuer but [the pursued]3124-the pursued . But even at that great distance [they]3102-the riders could see something so fanatical , so unquestionable in [his]3121-one rider figure , that [they]3102-the riders knew it was [the Secretary [himself]3125-the secretary himself]3125-the secretary himself . “[0-i] [I]0-i am sorry to cut short a cultured discussion , ” said [the Colonel]2828-the colonel , “[0-i] but can [you]0-i lend [me]0-i [your]0-i motor‑car now , in two minutes ? ” “[0-i] [I]0-i have a suspicion that [you]0-i are all mad , ” said [Dr. Renard]165-dr. renard , smiling sociably ; “[0-i] but God forbid that madness should in any way interrupt friendship . Let [us]1363-they go round to [the garage]1364-the garage . ” [Dr. Renard]165-dr. renard was [a mild man]3127-a mild man with monstrous wealth ; [[his]165-dr. renard rooms]3128-his rooms were like [the Musée de Cluny]3129-the musée de cluny , and [he]165-dr. renard had three motor‑cars . These , however , [he]165-dr. renard seemed to use very sparingly , having the simple tastes of [the French middle class]3130-the french middle class , and when [[his]165-dr. renard impatient friends]3131-his impatient friends came to examine [them]3131-his impatient friends , it took [them]3131-his impatient friends some time to assure [themselves]3131-his impatient friends that one of [them]3131-his impatient friends even could be made to work . This with some difficulty [they]1363-they brought round into [the street]277-the street before [[the Doctor]2681-the doctor ’s house]3134-the doctor ’s house . When [they]1363-they came out of [the dim garage]3135-the dim garage [they]1363-they were startled to find that twilight had already fallen with the abruptness of night in [the tropics]3136-the tropics . Either [they]1363-they had been longer in [the place]193-the place than [they]1363-they imagined , or some unusual canopy of cloud had gathered over [the town]1210-the town . [They]1363-they looked down [the steep streets]3139-the steep streets , and seemed to see a slight mist coming up from [the sea]2145-the sea . “[0-i] It is now or never , ” said [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull . “[0-i] [I]0-i hear horses . ” “[0-i] No , ” corrected [the Professor]805-the professor , “[0-i] a horse . ” And as [they]1363-they listened , it was evident that the noise , rapidly coming nearer on the rattling stones , was not the noise of [the whole cavalcade]3142-the whole cavalcade but that of [the one horseman , who had left it far behind — [the insane Secretary]3144-the insane secretary . [[Syme]85-syme ’s family]3145-syme ’s family , like most of [those who end in the simple life]3146-those who end in the simple life , had once owned [a motor]3147-a motor , and [he]85-syme knew all about [them]3145-syme ’s family]3143-the one horseman , who had left it far behind — the insane secretary . syme ’s family , like most of those who end in the simple life , had once owned a motor , and he knew all about them . [He]85-syme had leapt at once into [the chauffeur]3148-the chauffeur ’s seat , and with flushed face was wrenching and tugging at the disused machinery . [He]85-syme bent [his]85-syme strength upon one handle , and then said quite quietly — “[0-i] [I]0-i am afraid it ’s no go . ” As [he]85-syme spoke , there swept round the corner [a man]221-a man rigid on [his]221-a man rushing horse , with the rush and rigidity of an arrow . [He]85-syme had a smile that thrust out [his]85-syme chin as if it were dislocated . [He]85-syme swept alongside of [the stationary car]3150-the stationary car , into which [its]3150-the stationary car company had crowded , and laid [his]85-syme hand on the front . [It]3151-it was [the Secretary]701-the secretary , and [his]701-the secretary mouth went quite straight in the solemnity of triumph . [Syme]85-syme was leaning hard upon the steering wheel , and there was no sound but the rumble of [the other pursuers]3153-the other pursuers riding into [the town]1210-the town . Then there came quite suddenly a scream of scraping iron , and [the car]3155-the car leapt forward . [It]3155-the car plucked [the Secretary]701-the secretary clean out of [his]701-the secretary saddle , as a knife is whipped out of its sheath , trailed [him]701-the secretary kicking terribly for twenty yards , and left [him]701-the secretary flung flat upon [the road]278-the road far in front of [his]701-the secretary frightened horse . As [the car]3155-the car took the corner of [the street]277-the street with a splendid curve , [they]1365-we could just see [the other anarchists]3160-the other anarchists filling [the street]277-the street and raising [[their]3160-the other anarchists fallen leader]3162-their fallen leader . “[0-i] [I]0-i ca n’t understand why it has grown so dark , ” said [the Professor]805-the professor at last in a low voice . “[0-i] Going to be a storm , [I]0-i think , ” said [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull . “[0-i] [I]0-i say , it ’s a pity [we]1365-we have n’t got a light on [this car]1366-this car , if only to see by . ” “[1365-we] [We]1365-we have , ” said [the Colonel]2828-the colonel , and from the floor of [the car]3155-the car [he]2828-the colonel fished up a heavy , old‑fashioned , carved iron lantern with a light inside it . It was obviously an antique , and it would seem as if its original use had been in some way semi‑religious , for there was a rude moulding of a cross upon one of its sides . “[1365-we] Where on earth did [you]1367-you get that ? ” asked [the Professor]805-the professor . “[1367-you] [I]0-i got it where [I]0-i got [the car]3155-the car , ” answered [the Colonel]2828-the colonel , chuckling , “[0-i] from [[my]0-i best friend]1369-my best friend . While [[our]1365-we friend [here]2025-here]1370-our friend here was fighting with the steering wheel , [I]0-i ran up the front steps of [the house]1372-the house and spoke to [Renard]165-dr. renard , who was standing in [[his]165-dr. renard own porch]1373-his own porch , [you]1374-you will remember . ‘ [I]0-i suppose , ’ [I]0-i said , ‘ there ’s no time to get a lamp . ’ [He]165-dr. renard looked up , blinking amiably at the beautiful arched ceiling of [[his]165-dr. renard own front hall]1375-his own front hall . From this was suspended , by chains of exquisite ironwork , this lantern , one of the hundred treasures of [[his]165-dr. renard treasure house]1376-his treasure house . There was a certain allegory of [their]3168-their whole position in the contrast between [the modern automobile]3169-the modern automobile and its strange ecclesiastical lamp . [The town]1210-the town was mostly in shadow , but the sun had not sunk ; wherever [its]3155-the car level light could break through , it painted everything a burning gold . [That crowd ’s as law - abiding as a cow]3204-that crowd ’s as law - abiding as a cow , and if it were n’t , it ’s on [our]1413-they side . ”[134-dr. bull] “ How do [you]805-the professor know ? ”[805-the professor] asked [the professor]805-the professor , staring . “ [You]85-syme blind bat , ”[134-dr. bull] cried [Bull]134-dr. bull , “ do n’t [you]85-syme see who is leading [them]1413-they ? ”[134-dr. bull] [They]1413-they peered again , and then [the Colonel]2828-the colonel , with a catch in [his]2828-the colonel voice , cried out — “ Why , it ’s [Renard]165-dr. renard ! ”[2828-the colonel] There was , indeed , a rank of dim figures running across [the road]278-the road , and [they]1413-they could not be clearly seen ; but far enough in front to catch the accident of the evening light was stalking up and down [the unmistakable Dr. Renard]165-dr. renard , in a white hat , stroking [his]165-dr. renard long brown beard , and holding a revolver in [his]165-dr. renard left hand . “ What [a fool]2060-a fool [I]2828-the colonel ’ve been ! ”[2828-the colonel] exclaimed [the Colonel]2828-the colonel . “ Of course , [the dear old boy]3206-the dear old boy has turned out to help [us]3207-us . ”[2828-the colonel] [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull was bubbling over with laughter , swinging the sword in [his]134-dr. bull hand as carelessly as a cane . [He]134-dr. bull jumped out of [the car]3155-the car and ran across [the intervening space]1430-the intervening space , calling out — “ [Dr. Renard]165-dr. renard ! [Dr. Renard]165-dr. renard ! ”[134-dr. bull] An instant after [Syme]85-syme thought [his]85-syme own eyes had gone mad in [his]85-syme head . For the philanthropic [Dr. Renard]165-dr. renard had deliberately raised [his]165-dr. renard revolver and fired twice at [Bull]134-dr. bull , so that the shots rang down [the road]278-the road . Almost at the same second as the puff of white cloud went up from this atrocious explosion a long puff of white cloud went up also from the cigarette of [the cynical Ratcliffe]163-ratcliffe . Like [all the rest]1432-all the rest [he]134-dr. bull turned a little pale , but [he]134-dr. bull smiled . [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull , at whom the bullets had been fired , just missing [his]134-dr. bull scalp , stood quite still in the middle of [the road]278-the road without a sign of fear , and then turned very slowly and crawled back to [the car]3155-the car , and climbed in with two holes through [his]134-dr. bull hat . “ Well , ”[1435-the cigarette smoker] said [the cigarette smoker]1435-the cigarette smoker slowly , “ what do [you]134-dr. bull think now ? ”[1435-the cigarette smoker] “ [I]134-dr. bull think , ”[134-dr. bull] said [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull with precision , “ that [I]134-dr. bull am lying in bed at [No]65-no . [The others]604-the others did not understand [his]85-syme words , but when [they]604-the others looked back at [the street above]1458-the street above [they]604-the others saw [the hostile cavalry]1459-the hostile cavalry coming round the corner and down [the slopes]1460-the slopes after [them]1449-them ; and foremost of all rode [the good innkeeper , flushed with the fiery innocence of the evening light]1461-the good innkeeper , flushed with the fiery innocence of the evening light . “ [The world]231-the world is insane ! ”[805-the professor] said [the Professor]805-the professor , and buried [his]805-the professor face in [his]805-the professor hands . “ No , ”[134-dr. bull] said [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull in adamantine humility , “ it is [I.]134-dr. bull ”[134-dr. bull] “ What are [we]3234-we going to do ? ”[805-the professor] asked [the Professor]805-the professor . “ At this moment , ”[85-syme] said [Syme]85-syme , with a scientific detachment , “ [I]85-syme think [we]3234-we are going to smash into a lamppost . ”[85-syme] The next instant [the automobile]1464-the automobile had come with a catastrophic jar against an iron object . The instant after that [four men]1465-four men had crawled out from under a chaos of metal , and a tall lean lamp‑post that had stood up straight on the edge of [the marine parade]1466-the marine parade stood out , bent and twisted , like the branch of a broken tree . “ Well , [we]3234-we smashed something , ”[805-the professor] said [the Professor]805-the professor , with a faint smile . “ That ’s some comfort . ”[805-the professor] “ [You]85-syme ’re becoming [an anarchist]1937-an anarchist , ”[85-syme] said [Syme]85-syme , dusting [his]85-syme clothes with [his]85-syme instinct of daintiness . “ [Everyone]271-everyone is , ”[163-ratcliffe] said [Ratcliffe]163-ratcliffe . [Syme]85-syme snatched a sword , and took it in [his]85-syme teeth ; [he]85-syme stuck [two others]1473-two others under [his]85-syme arm‑pits , took a fourth in [his]85-syme left hand and the lantern in [his]85-syme right , and leapt off [the high parade]1474-the high parade on to [the beach]1475-the beach below . [The others]604-the others leapt after [him]85-syme , with a common acceptance of such decisive action , leaving the debris and [the gathering mob]1477-the gathering mob above [them]1468-they . “ [We]1468-they have one more chance , ”[85-syme] said [Syme]85-syme , taking the steel out of [his]85-syme mouth . “ Whatever all this pandemonium means , [I]85-syme suppose [the police station]3085-the police station will help [us]1468-they . [We]1468-they ca n’t get there , for [they]604-the others hold the way . [They]1468-they marched down [a long , low jetty]1480-a long , low jetty , running out in one arm into [the dim , boiling sea]1481-the dim , boiling sea , and when [they]1468-they came to the end of it [they]1468-they felt that [they]1468-they had come to the end of [their]1468-they story . [They]1468-they turned and faced [the town]1210-the town . [That town]1483-that town was transfigured with uproar . All along [the high parade from which [they]1468-they had just descended]1484-the high parade from which they had just descended was a dark and roaring stream of humanity , with tossing arms and fiery faces , groping and glaring towards [them]1468-they . The long dark line was dotted with torches and lanterns ; but even where no flame lit up a furious face , [they]1468-they could see in the farthest figure , in the most shadowy gesture , an organised hate . It was clear that [they]1468-they were [the accursed of [all men]1486-all men]1485-the accursed of all men , and [they]1468-they knew not why . [Two or three men]1487-two or three men , looking little and black like monkeys , leapt over the edge as [they]1487-two or three men had done and dropped on to [the beach]1475-the beach . [These]1489-these came ploughing down [the deep sand]1490-the deep sand , shouting horribly , and strove to wade into [the sea]2145-the sea at random . The example was followed , and [the whole black mass of men]1492-the whole black mass of men began to run and drip over the edge like black treacle . Foremost among [the men on [the beach]1475-the beach]1493-the men on the beach [Syme]85-syme saw [the peasant who had driven [[their]1468-they cart]1496-their cart]1495-the peasant who had driven their cart . [He]85-syme splashed into the surf on a huge cart‑horse , and shook [his]85-syme axe at [them]1468-they . “ [The peasant]3026-the peasant ! ”[85-syme] cried [Syme]85-syme . “ [They]3026-the peasant have not risen since the Middle Ages . ”[85-syme] “ Even if [the police]2007-the police do come now , ”[805-the professor] said [the Professor]805-the professor mournfully , “ [they]2007-the police can do nothing with [this mob]3243-this mob . ”[805-the professor] “ Nonsence ! ”[134-dr. bull] said [Bull]134-dr. bull desperately ; “ there must be [some people left in [the town]1210-the town who are human]3244-some people left in the town who are human . ”[134-dr. bull] “ No , ”[1498-the hopeless inspector] said [the hopeless Inspector]1498-the hopeless inspector , “ [the human being]3246-the human being will soon be extinct . Then [he]805-the professor added in [his]805-the professor dreamy voice , “ What is all that at the end of the ‘ Dunciad ’ ? Nor public flame ; nor private , dares to shine ; Nor human light is left , nor glimpse divine ! Lo ! [thy]1501-they dread Empire , Chaos , is restored ; Light dies before thine uncreating word : [Thy]1501-they hand , [great Anarch]170-great anarch , lets the curtain fall ; And universal darkness buries all . ”[805-the professor] ’ “ Stop ! ”[134-dr. bull] cried [Bull]134-dr. bull suddenly , “ [the gendarmes]1336-the gendarmes are out . ”[134-dr. bull] The low lights of [the police station]3085-the police station were indeed blotted and broken with hurrying figures , and [they]1501-they heard through the darkness the clash and jingle of [a disciplined cavalry]1502-a disciplined cavalry . ’ [They]1501-they are charging [the mob]1503-the mob ! ” cried [Bull]134-dr. bull in ecstacy or alarm . “[1501-they] No , ” said [Syme]85-syme , “[1501-they] [they]1501-they are formed along the parade . ” “[1501-they] [They]1501-they have unslung [their]1501-they carbines , ” cried [Bull]134-dr. bull dancing with excitement . “[1501-they] Yes , ” said [Ratcliffe]163-ratcliffe , “[1501-they] and [they]1501-they are going to fire on [us]1504-us . ” As [he]163-ratcliffe spoke there came a long crackle of musketry , and bullets seemed to hop like hailstones on the stones in front of [them]1501-they . ’ [The gendarmes]1336-the gendarmes have joined [them]1501-they ! ”[805-the professor] cried [the Professor]805-the professor , and struck [his]805-the professor forehead . “ [I]134-dr. bull am in [the padded cell]3251-the padded cell , ”[134-dr. bull] said [Bull]134-dr. bull solidly . There was a long silence , and then [Ratcliffe]163-ratcliffe said , looking out over [the swollen sea]1506-the swollen sea , all a sort of grey purple — “ What does it matter who is mad or who is sane ? [We]1504-us shall all be dead soon . ”[163-ratcliffe] [Syme]85-syme turned to [him]163-ratcliffe and said — “ [You]163-ratcliffe are quite hopeless , then ? ”[85-syme] [Mr. Ratcliffe]171-mr. ratcliffe kept a stony silence ; then at last [he]163-ratcliffe said quietly — “ No ; oddly enough [I]163-ratcliffe am not quite hopeless . The power of [this whole planet]3252-this whole planet is against [us]1504-us , yet [I]163-ratcliffe can not help wondering whether this one silly little hope is hopeless yet . ”[163-ratcliffe] “ In what or whom is [your]163-ratcliffe hope ? ”[85-syme] asked [Syme]85-syme with curiosity . “ In [a man [I]279-the other never saw]3253-a man i never saw , ”[279-the other] said [the other]279-the other , looking at [the leaden sea]1508-the leaden sea . “ [I]85-syme know what [you]279-the other mean , ”[85-syme] said [Syme]85-syme in a low voice , “ [the man in the dark room]3254-the man in the dark room . [Many of [[their]1516-their pursuers]2954-their pursuers]1515-many of their pursuers had waded into [the water]2194-the water shaking [their]1515-many of their pursuers fists , but [the sea]2145-the sea was rough , and [they]1515-many of their pursuers could not reach [the pier]377-the pier . [Two or three figures]1521-two or three figures , however , stood on the beginning of the stone footway , and seemed to be cautiously advancing down [it]1522-it . The glare of a chance lantern lit up the faces of [the two foremost]1523-the two foremost . [One face]1524-one face wore a black half‑mask , and under it the mouth was twisting about in such a madness of nerves that the black tuft of beard wriggled round and round like a restless , living thing . [They]1516-their were in earnest consultation . “ Yes , [he]158-colonel ducroix is gone too , ”[805-the professor] said [the Professor]805-the professor , and sat down on a stone . “ Everything ’s gone . [I]805-the professor ’m gone ! [I]805-the professor ca n’t trust [my]805-the professor own bodily machinery . [I]805-the professor feel as if [my]805-the professor own hand might fly up and strike [me]805-the professor . ”[805-the professor] “ When [my]85-syme hand flies up , ”[85-syme] said [Syme]85-syme , “ it will strike [somebody else]3263-somebody else , ”[85-syme] and [he]85-syme strode along [the pier]377-the pier towards [the Colonel]2828-the colonel , the sword in one hand and the lantern in the other . As if to destroy the last hope or doubt , [the Colonel]2828-the colonel , who saw [him]85-syme coming , pointed [his]2828-the colonel revolver at [him]85-syme and fired . The shot missed [Syme]85-syme , but struck [his]2828-the colonel sword , breaking it short at the hilt . [Syme]85-syme rushed on , and swung the iron lantern above [his]85-syme head . “ [Judas]172-judas before [Herod]173-herod ! ”[85-syme] [he]85-syme said , and struck [the Colonel]2828-the colonel down upon the stones . Then [he]85-syme turned to [the Secretary , whose frightful mouth]1530-the secretary , whose frightful mouth was almost foaming now , and held the lamp high with so rigid and arresting a gesture , that [the man]294-the man was , as it were , frozen for a moment , and forced to hear . “ Do [you]294-the man see this lantern ? ”[85-syme] cried [Syme]85-syme in a terrible voice . “ Do [you]294-the man see the cross carved on it , and the flame inside ? [You]294-the man did not make it . [You]294-the man did not light it , [Better men than [you]294-the man]3264-better men than you , [men who could believe and obey]3265-men who could believe and obey , twisted the entrails of iron and preserved the legend of fire . There is not [a street]577-a street [you]294-the man walk on , there is not a thread [you]294-the man wear , that was not made as this lantern was , by denying [your]294-the man philosophy of dirt and rats . [You]294-the man can make nothing . [You]294-the man can only destroy . [You]294-the man will destroy [mankind]2056-mankind ; [you]294-the man will destroy [the world]231-the world . Let that suffice [you]294-the man . Yet this one old Christian lantern [you]294-the man shall not destroy . It shall go where [[your]294-the man empire of apes]3269-your empire of apes will never have the wit to find it . ”[1532-he] [He]1532-he struck [the Secretary]701-the secretary once with the lantern so that [he]701-the secretary staggered ; and then , whirling it twice round [his]701-the secretary head , sent it flying far out to [sea]1534-sea , where it flared like a roaring rocket and fell . “ Swords ! ”[85-syme] shouted [Syme]85-syme , turning [his]85-syme flaming face ; to [the three behind [him]85-syme]1535-the three behind him . “ Let [us]3270-us charge these dogs , for [our]3270-us time has come to die . ”[85-syme] [[His]1532-he three companions]1536-his three companions came after [him]1532-he sword in hand . [Syme]85-syme ’s sword was broken , but [he]1532-he rent a bludgeon from the fist of [a fisherman]1537-a fisherman , flinging [him]1532-he down . In a moment [they]1536-his three companions would have flung [themselves]1536-his three companions upon the face of [the mob]1503-the mob and perished , when an interruption came . [The Secretary]701-the secretary , ever since [Syme]85-syme ’s speech , had stood with [his]701-the secretary hand to [his]701-the secretary stricken head as if dazed ; now [he]701-the secretary suddenly pulled off [his]701-the secretary black mask . The pale face thus peeled in the lamplight revealed not so much rage as astonishment . [He]701-the secretary put up [his]701-the secretary hand with an anxious authority . “ There is some mistake , ”[701-the secretary] [he]701-the secretary said . “ [Mr. Syme]85-syme , [I]701-the secretary hardly think [you]85-syme understand [your]85-syme position . [I]701-the secretary arrest [you]85-syme in the name of the law . ”[701-the secretary] “ Of the law ? ”[85-syme] said [Syme]85-syme , and dropped [his]85-syme stick . “ Certainly ! ”[701-the secretary] said [the Secretary]701-the secretary . “ [I]701-the secretary am [a detective from [Scotland Yard]15-scotland yard]3271-a detective from scotland yard , ”[701-the secretary] and [he]701-the secretary took a small blue card from [his]701-the secretary pocket . “ And what do [you]805-the professor suppose [we]3272-we are ? ”[805-the professor] asked [the Professor]805-the professor , and threw up [his]805-the professor arms . “ [You]85-syme , ”[701-the secretary] said [the Secretary]701-the secretary stiffly , “ are , as [I]701-the secretary know for a fact , [members of [the Supreme Anarchist Council]3274-the supreme anarchist council]3273-members of the supreme anarchist council . Disguised as one of [you]85-syme , [I]701-the secretary — ”[701-the secretary] [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull tossed [his]134-dr. bull sword into [the sea]2145-the sea . “ There never was any Supreme Anarchist Council , ”[134-dr. bull] [he]134-dr. bull said . “ [We]3272-we were all a lot of [silly policemen]3275-silly policemen looking at [each other]349-each other . And [all these nice people who have been peppering [us]3272-we with shot]3277-all these nice people who have been peppering us with shot thought [we]3272-we were [the dynamiters]3278-the dynamiters . [I]134-dr. bull knew [I]134-dr. bull could n’t be wrong about [the mob]1503-the mob , ”[134-dr. bull] [he]134-dr. bull said , beaming over the enormous multitude , which stretched away to the distance on both sides . “ [Vulgar people]3280-vulgar people are never mad . [I]134-dr. bull ’m vulgar [myself]134-dr. bull , and [I]134-dr. bull know . [I]134-dr. bull am now going on [shore]2751-shore to stand a drink to [everybody]376-everybody [here]2025-here . ”[134-dr. bull] NEXT morning [five bewildered but hilarious people]1544-five bewildered but hilarious people took [the boat]467-the boat for [Dover]56-dover . [The poor old Colonel]158-colonel ducroix might have had some cause to complain , having been first forced to fight for [two factions that did n’t exist , and then knocked down with an iron lantern]1546-two factions that did n’t exist , and then knocked down with an iron lantern . [The five reconciled detectives]1550-the five reconciled detectives had a hundred details to explain to [each other]349-each other . [The Secretary]701-the secretary had to tell [Syme]85-syme how [they]1550-the five reconciled detectives had come to wear masks originally in order to approach [the supposed enemy]1553-the supposed enemy as [fellow‑conspirators]1554-fellow‑conspirators ; [Syme]85-syme had to explain how [they]1550-the five reconciled detectives had fled with such swiftness through [a civilised country]1555-a civilised country . But above all these matters of detail which could be explained , rose the central mountain of the matter that [they]1550-the five reconciled detectives could not explain . What did it all mean ? If [they]1550-the five reconciled detectives were [all harmless officers]1556-all harmless officers , what was [Sunday]107-sunday ? If [he]107-sunday had not seized [the world]231-the world , what on earth had [he]107-sunday been up to ? [Inspector Ratcliffe]163-ratcliffe was still gloomy about this . “ [I]163-ratcliffe ca n’t make head or tail of [old Sunday]3284-old sunday ’s little game any more than [you]85-syme can , ”[163-ratcliffe] [he]163-ratcliffe said . “ But whatever else [Sunday]107-sunday is , [he]107-sunday is n’t [a blameless citizen]3285-a blameless citizen . [You]85-syme will excuse [me]701-the secretary , ”[701-the secretary] [he]701-the secretary said , with a rather ghastly smile , “ for being well acquainted with [my]701-the secretary secretarial duties . ”[701-the secretary] “ [I]805-the professor suppose [you]85-syme are right , ”[805-the professor] said [the Professor]805-the professor reflectively . “ [I]805-the professor suppose [we]3286-we might find it out from [him]3287-he ; but [I]805-the professor confess that [I]805-the professor should feel a bit afraid of asking [Sunday]107-sunday who [he]3287-he really is . ”[805-the professor] “ Why , ”[701-the secretary] asked [the Secretary]701-the secretary , “ for fear of bombs ? ”[701-the secretary] “ No , ”[805-the professor] said [the Professor]805-the professor , “ for fear [he]3287-he might tell [me]805-the professor . ”[805-the professor] “ Let [us]3286-we have some drinks , ”[134-dr. bull] said [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull , after a silence . Throughout [their]1562-they whole journey by [boat]1563-boat and [train]1564-train [they]1562-they were highly convivial , but [they]1562-they instinctively kept together . Yet even then the adventures of the day were not entirely over . [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull , discontented with the general proposal to go to bed , had strolled out of [the hotel]597-the hotel at about eleven to see and taste some of the beauties of [London]2-london . Twenty minutes afterwards , however , [he]134-dr. bull came back and made quite a clamour in [the hall]1572-the hall . [Syme]85-syme , who tried at first to soothe [him]134-dr. bull , was forced at last to listen to [his]134-dr. bull communication with quite new attention . “ [I]134-dr. bull tell [you]85-syme [I]134-dr. bull ’ve seen [him]134-dr. bull ! ”[134-dr. bull] said [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull , with thick emphasis . “ Whom ? ”[85-syme] asked [Syme]85-syme quickly . “ Not [the President]2320-the president ? ”[85-syme] “ Not so bad as that , ”[134-dr. bull] said [Dr. Bull]134-dr. bull , with unnecessary laughter , “ not so bad as that . [He]1583-him was sitting alone with bent head , poring over a newspaper . [They]1578-the reunited six had disputed much upon [their]1578-the reunited six policy , about whether [they]1578-the reunited six should leave [the unmasked Gogol]124-gogol without and begin diplomatically , or whether [they]1578-the reunited six should bring [him]1583-him in and blow up the gunpowder at once . What an exquisite day it is . Is [the Czar]691-the czar dead ? ”[1586-the secretary to the last] [The Secretary , who happened to be foremost]1588-the secretary , who happened to be foremost , drew [himself]1588-the secretary , who happened to be foremost together for a dignified outburst . “ No , [sir]2017-sir , ”[1588-the secretary , who happened to be foremost] [he]1588-the secretary , who happened to be foremost said sternly “ there has been no massacre .
